Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Player>
public class Player extends Object implements Comparable<Player>
The Player is the entity used to model the behaviour and action a person might do in the game.

    • Player

      public Player(int playerId, String playerNickname) throws IOException
      Constructor method for the Player class
      Parameters:
      playerId - Unique identifier for each player
      playerNickname - Unique name chosen by each player
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - Throws FileNotFoundException if file containing all the assistants is not found

    • initializePlayerBoard

      public void initializePlayerBoard(int[] students)
      This method sets up the player board of the play using the random students provided as parameter
      Parameters:
      students - The students used to initialize the dining room's entrance

    • playAssistant

      public void playAssistant(int assistantId)
      This method allows a player to play an Assistant, and it removes that assistant form the playable ones
      Parameters:
      assistantId - used to identify which assistant has been played

    • moveToPlayerBoard

      public void moveToPlayerBoard(Places place, int color)
      This method is used to move a student to the entrance or to the dining room
      Parameters:
      place - used to identify where the student will be put in
      color - used to identify the color of the student

    • removeFromPlayerBoard

      public void removeFromPlayerBoard(Places place, int color)
      This method allows a player (using the character) to remove students from the dining room and the entrance
      Parameters:
      place - where the student is taken
      color - which student is removed
